name: Creeper Run: Frozen Nights
description:
It's dark... It's cold... and the night is frozen. The creepers are in pursuit but Steve still needs diamonds!

Run from the creeper chasing you, and don't run into the creepers attacking you!!! All your favorite running, jumping, turning and sliding, with hostile exploding creepers, TNT, creeper pits, jumping creepers, creeper gangs and other hazards. How many nights of running from the creeper can you survive? How far can you run from the creeper in this frozen tundra? How many diamonds can you collect before the creeper finally gets you?

Features:

-Chase creeper!
-Creeper pits!
-Exploding creepers!
-Jumping creepers!
-Creeper gangs!
-Jumping
-Running
-Sliding
-Diamonds!

Jeepers creepers! Don't get blown up! Now please enjoy this heartwarming creeper haiku:

Creeper run
Jump, it's frozen,
Chilly diamond over cobblestone.

I run in snowy biome
And run run creeper run
Must have diamond.

Run creeper run,
Grab diamond Steve,
How soon creeper explodes.
